rules.description: CAPS LOCK + hjkl to arrow keys
CAPS LOCK + shift + hjkl to scroll
Yabai Rules Suite - Space Focus Management (includes everything that implies another space will be focused)
Yabai Rules Suite - Windows Management (includes everything that implies another window will be focused, created, destroyed or modified somehow. Not includes in any case Space focus changes)

to.shell_command: /usr/local/bin/yabai -m window --swap west || $(yabai -m window --display west; /usr/local/bin/yabai -m display --focus west)
/usr/local/bin/yabai -m window --swap south || $(yabai -m window --display south; /usr/local/bin/yabai -m display --focus south)
/usr/local/bin/yabai -m window --swap north || $(yabai -m window --display north; /usr/local/bin/yabai -m display --focus north)
/usr/local/bin/yabai -m window --swap east || $(yabai -m window --display east; /usr/local/bin/yabai -m display --focus east)
osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to log out'
